hero_title: Full Stack Developer & Computer Science Student
hero_subtitle: I build modern web and desktop apps using advanced technologies, with full-stack experience in APIs, databases, and UI/UX.
about_subtitle: Passionate developer and university student with over 2 years of hands-on experience
about_text_1: I'm a programmer, Full Stack Developer, and computer science student. I develop websites, desktop applications, and APIs using technologies like React, Next.js, Flask, and Django. I have deep Python expertise and experience in C and Java.
about_text_2: I’ve built over 100 projects (10+ fully completed), worked with databases such as MySQL and PostgreSQL, and handled various data formats like JSON, CSV, Excel, and SQL. I've collaborated with 5+ offline clients and continuously improve my skills in low-level programming, math, and physics.
